DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate safety effectiveness THERMOCOOL® SMARTTOUCH™ Catheters Contact Force Sensing Capability treatment drug refractory symptomatic paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation ( AF ) standard electrophysiology map RF procedure .
DOC.brief_title: THERMOCOOL® SMARTTOUCH™ Catheter Treatment Symptomatic Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Have least 3 atrial fibrillation episode within 6 month study Have fail least one antiarrhythmic drug show repeat atrial fibrillation episodes 18 year age old Have previous ablation atrial fibrillation Have take amiodarone within 6 month study Have heart surgery within last 60 day Have heart attack within last 60 day Females pregnant breast feeding
